thread.title: BRIEF-Lululemon Athletica CEO Laurent Potdevin Resigns

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Lululemon Athletica CEO Laurent Potdevin Resigns
text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Lululemon Athletica Inc:
* CEO LAURENT POTDEVIN RESIGNS * ‍THREE SENIOR LEADERS TO ASSUME EXPANDED ROLES REPORTING TO EXECUTIVE CHAIRMAN GLENN MURPHY​
* ‍BOARD OF DIRECTORS HAS IMMEDIATELY BEGUN A SEARCH PROCESS FOR A GLOBAL CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER​
* ‍ALSO REAFFIRMED ITS UPDATED GUIDANCE PROVIDED ON JANUARY 8, 2018​
* ‍REMAIN ON TRACK TO ACHIEVE $4 BILLION IN REVENUE IN 2020​
* LULULEMON-EXPECTS EMPLOYEES TO EXEMPLIFY “HIGHEST LEVELS OF INTEGRITY AND RESPECT FOR ONE ANOTHER”; POTDEVIN “FELL SHORT” OF THE STANDARDS OF CONDUCT‍​ ‍​
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.53, REVENUE VIEW $2.63 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
